text: The 2016 Nice attack happened on 14 July 2016 in Nice, France. A man drove a truck into people celebrating Bastille Day, the national day of France. He killed 86 and injured 434 people. Gunfire was reported; at first, people thought it was fireworks. At around 22:45 local time, a truck was driven into a large crowd of people at Promenade des Anglais. Later, guns were fired. The driver, Tunisian truck driver Mohamed Lahouaiej-Bouhlel, was killed by police. ==Related pages== * France * Fascism * Islamism * Antisemitism * Islamic terrorism ==References== Category:2016 in France Category:2010s crimes in France Category:2010s murders in Europe Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2016 Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in France Category:July 2016 events Category:Mass murder in 2016 Category:Mass murder in France Category:Massacres in Europe 2016 attack Category:Terrorist incidents in Europe in 2016 Category:Terrorist incidents involving vehicular attacks
title: 2016 Nice attack
